showScoreExcerpt: "The play is like an elixir to 'Harry Potter' zealots...Except for the dazzling technical aspects...I was put-off by the long, complicated and exceedingly dark story that has little apparent moral value...This stage play...Is filled with fat and indulgences....Some special effects appear to exist simply to elicit awe...Technically the production is splendid...The acting is so good that it appears easy...The overwhelming earnestness of all becomes dulling."
